definition: to carry a story/to publish (in a newspaper or magazine)
to print/to publish/publication/periodical/to peel with a knife/to carve/to amend

to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)

sentences.english: The work is published in the European Journal of Operational Research.
sentences.chinese: 這項研究調查刊登在歐洲運籌學雜誌上。

sentences.english: Sets of works published by the Metropolitan Express.
sentences.chinese: 多套作品被都市快報刊登。

sentences.english: The solemn statement was featured in full in the newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 各報全文刊登了這一莊嚴的聲明。

sentences.english: The research is reported in Biochemical and Biophysical Research Communications.
sentences.chinese: 這項研究被刊登在《生化與生理研究通訊》上。

sentences.english: This ad pulled better than any other we have run.
sentences.chinese: 這個廣告比我們刊登過的任何其他廣告更能吸引人。

sentences.english: It was too late to prevent the story from appearing in the national newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 要阻止全國性報紙刊登這件事已經爲時過晚。

sentences.english: The passenger carrying capacity of a tramcar is nominal figure listed in gazette schedules.
sentences.chinese: 電車的載客量是憲報刊登的名義上數字。

sentences.english: Allocation of the booth location and advertisement placement will be on a first-come-first-served basis.
sentences.chinese: 展臺位置及刊登廣告申請按先到先得原則分配。

sentences.english: Those findings appear online in the Journal of the Acoustical Society of America.
sentences.chinese: 《美國聲學學報》電子版刊登了上述發現。

sentences.english: It publishes the articles of all aspects of glia structure and function.
sentences.chinese: 該雜誌刊登有關神經膠質結構和功能各方面的文章。

sentences.english: Her story and the pictures appear in the May issue of National Geographic magazine.
sentences.chinese: 國家地理雜誌五月期刊登了她的故事及一些相關照片。

sentences.english: Putting back after the new, she also published, but no harvest.
sentences.chinese: 回新後，她還刊登了尋人啓事，可惜都沒有收穫。

sentences.english: Listed companies are not generally required to issue paid announcements in gazetted newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 上市公司毋須在憲報指定報章刊登付款公佈披露資料。

sentences.english: The findings were published by the journal Nature.
sentences.chinese: 這個發現被刊登在《自然》雜誌裏。

sentences.english: The brain imaging research appears in the Journal of Sexual Medicine.
sentences.chinese: 大腦圖像研究刊登在《性醫學雜誌》上。

sentences.english: The magazine makes a feature of children s stories.
sentences.chinese: 這本雜誌以刊登兒童故事爲特色。

definition: to log out (computer)/to publish/to be published/to appear (in a newspaper etc)
Dagong Bao, popular newspaper name/Ta Kung Pao, newspaper founded 1902 in Beijing, now published in Hong Kong
to appear in the news/in the papers
to publish (in newspapers or magazines)/to record (bookkeeping entries)
page of a publication (e.g. newspaper or website)/printing space (reserved for some content)/page layout
